item.title: New Container: Piper
item.description: We have released a new container for Piper! Piper is a fast, local neural text to speech system that sounds great and is optimized for the Raspberry Pi 4. This container provides a Wyoming protocol server for piper.
item.content:
We have released a new container for Piper!

Piper is a fast, local neural text to speech system that sounds great and is optimized for the Raspberry Pi 4. This container provides a Wyoming protocol server for piper.
